bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Type here a clear and concise description of the bug. Aim for 2-3 sentences. python3.7.3,streamlit-0.49.0 <denchmark-code>import streamlit as st st.grid() </denchmark-code>
bug: AttributeError: module 'streamlit' has no attribute 'grid'

comments.comment: did you running it on linuxï¼Ÿ,i got a same issue,trying to find annother way
I am facing a similar issue: import streamlit as st import pandas as pd st.title('Data Analytics Platform') AttributeError: module 'streamlit' has no attribute 'title'

Summary Type here a clear and concise description of the bug. Aim for 2-3 sentences. python3.7.3,streamlit-0.49.0 import streamlit as st st.grid()
bug: AttributeError: module 'streamlit' has no attribute 'grid'
Hi, out of curiosity, what did you name your script?

I am facing a similar issue: import streamlit as st import pandas as pd st.title('Data Analytics Platform') AttributeError: module 'streamlit' has no attribute 'title'
My problem was due to my naming my app streamlit.py. Apparently that caused an issue. After renaming it, the problem went away.

I am facing a similar issue: import streamlit as st import pandas as pd st.title('Data Analytics Platform') AttributeError: module 'streamlit' has no attribute 'title'
My problem was due to my naming my app streamlit.py. Apparently that caused an issue. After renaming it, the problem went away.
Mine too, i had streamlit.py file and everythimg works well when i renamed.

I have used this code to create a month year box in same row but it shows AttributeError: module 'streamlit' has no attribute 'beta_columns':- col1, col2 = st.beta_columns(2) with col1: st.selectbox('Month',('Jan','Feb','Mar','Apr','May','Jun','July','Aug','Sep','Oct','Nov','Dec'),use_column_width=True) <denchmark-code> with col2: st.selectbox('Year', range(1990, 2030),use_column_width=True) </denchmark-code>

I have used this code to create a month year box in same row but it shows AttributeError: module 'streamlit' has no attribute 'beta_columns':- col1, col2 = st.beta_columns(2) with col1: st.selectbox('Month',('Jan','Feb','Mar','Apr','May','Jun','July','Aug','Sep','Oct','Nov','Dec'),use_column_width=True) with col2: st.selectbox('Year', range(1990, 2030),use_column_width=True)
Did you find a solution?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/stdusr>@stdusr</denchmark-link> updating streamlit with solved the issue for me

@stdusr updating streamlit with pip install --upgrade streamlit solved the issue for me
This does not work for me. Version is 0.71.0
